<inner> {!Array.} extractCursorStates(undoStates)
Reduce the provided undo states to just unique AddCursor followed by MoveCursor commands for each still-present cursor. This is used when restoring the original document state at the start of an undo step
Parameters:
{!Array.>} undoStates
Returns:
{!Array.}

Move backward the desired number of states. Will stop when the number of states is reached, or no more undo states are available.
